mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, b.*, a.gServTitle, (b.rememSize*a.gservprice) amount from reservation b, gService a where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and b.memberID ='${memberId}' and b.pay_yn='n' and b.cancel_yn='n' order by b.reservdate desc) where rn between ${start} and ${end}
select count(*) from reservation where memberId='${value}' and pay_yn='n' and cancel_yn='n'
select count(*) from reservation where memberId='${value}' and success_yn='y'
select b.*, a.gServTitle, (b.rememSize*a.gservprice) amount from reservation b, gService a where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and payCode='${value}'

select * from ( select rownum rn, b.*, a.gServTitle, (select count(*) from review c where b.gservno=c.gservno and b.memberId=c.memberId) rvNum from reservation b, gService a where a.gservno=b.GSERVNO and b.memberID ='${memberId }' and b.success_yn='y' order by b.tourdate desc) where rn between ${start } and ${end }
mapper.update: update reservation set cancel_yn='y' where payCode='${value}'
